attributes.action: increase Defence funding to 3% of GDP by 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although defence spending increases steadily, it increases by small amounts and remains lower than needed to defend UK interests. The UK National Defence Association calls for a level of defence spending at 3% of GDP. This is still lower than the level when the Falklands Conflict was fought.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "increase Defence funding to 3% of GDP by 2012."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14981.asp

Prime Minister's Office
